name: Golf
summary: Golf is a 1980 video game developed and published by Atari, Inc. for the Atari VCS (later called the Atari 2600) based on the sport of the same name. The game allows one or two players to play nine holes of simplified golf.
info:
• 中文名: 雅达利高尔夫
  • 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: SPG
  • 游玩人数: 1~2人
  • 发行日期: 1980年
